callToAction: SoCool - Create an AI assistant with just a few clicks
questionHelp: What do you want me to help?
questionSell: Which product do you want to sell?
questionBuy: Which product do you want to buy?
questionPrice: Which price are you happy with?
questionCriteriaBuy: Do you have any criteria for buyers that I need to pay attention to? please list out
questionCriteriaSell: Do you have any seller criteria I should pay attention to? Please list them out
writeSomethingHere:
Write something here? 
Example: iPhone 15 Pro Max Pure Gold Edition, version 512G, unboxed...
inputEmailAddress: Please input your email address to receive your custom link!
sureInformation: Are you sure 100% with information you input?
frequentEmail: Please use your frequent email address to receive the result of the successful negotiation!
pleaseCheckMail: Please check your email for your custom link
bestOfLuck: Wish you the best of luck
errorValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
alertCheckMail: You have successfully created the link, please check your email again
404NotFound: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
goBackHome: Go back to the home page
oneMinute: You have one minute left to talk to me!
placeholderAddress:
Your Address 
Example: 123 Main Street, Apartment 4B, Springfield, IL 62701, USA
questionYourAddress: Please fill in your complete address in the box below.
sampleSuggestProduct: This is the sample we suggest, would you like to try it right away?
tryAgain: An error occurred, please try again.
currentMarket: The current market reference price range fluctuates.
tryAgain8Hour: You have already confirmed once, please wait 8 hours to continue using this link again
pleaseAnotherEmail: You are the owner of this link, Please provide another email address to continue using.
continueExperience: Your chat time has ended. We are happy that you have used SoCool's services. Let's continue to experience more!
warningMaximumLink: You have reached your maximum link creation limit for today
